message.content:
cs.SY, cs.DS, cs.CC, cs.LG, cs.IT. 

This paper deals with the problem of choosing which nodes of a linear dynamical system should be actuated to achieve a given state transfer, which is a problem in control theory. Therefore, cs.SY (Systems and Control) is the most likely sub-category. The problem is also related to graph theory and optimization, which suggests cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) and cs.CC (Computational Complexity) as likely sub-categories. The paper uses techniques from linear algebra and information theory, which could place it in cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.IT (Information Theory) as well.
